sentences.en: A sumptuous man was the Farmer - General.
sentences.cn: 赋税承包商是个奢侈的人.

sentences.en: Bob and Louise had prepared a sumptuous meal to thaw out our bodies.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃和路易丝为我们准备了一顿丰盛的饭菜给我们暖暖身子。

sentences.en: I must get into sumptuous raiment , and it wouldn't do to run and jump into it.
sentences.cn: 我得穿上富丽奢华的的衣服, 而且猛一下子穿上还不行.

sentences.en: Johnson stared goggle-eyed at Kravis' sumptuous quarters.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊目瞪口呆地望着克拉维斯的豪宅。

sentences.en: Norma, what I've got from you has been sumptuous.
sentences.cn: 诺玛, 我从你那儿已经得到了很多很多了.

sentences.en: She produces elegant wedding gowns in a variety of sumptuous fabrics.
sentences.cn: 她用各种华贵的布料制作高雅的婚纱。

sentences.en: Sumptuous food and patriotic music created an atmosphere of elegant conviviality.
sentences.cn: 佳肴盛馔和爱国乐曲,使气氛十分优雅而欢乐.

sentences.en: The guests turned up dressed in sumptuous evening gowns.
sentences.cn: 客人们身着华丽的夜礼服出现了.

sentences.en: The king gave a sumptuous banquet.
sentences.cn: 国王举行一次奢侈的宴会.

sentences.en: The portraits and sumptuous ornaments, and the gold clock, show that this is not just any old front room.
sentences.cn: 墙上挂的画像、奢华的装饰和那座金钟都表明这可不是一间普普通通的客厅。

sentences.en: Then we lounged through many and many a sumptuous private mansions.
sentences.cn: 后来我们又在不少金碧辉煌的私人府邸中闲逛.

sentences.en: To accept ( these sumptuous gifts ) embarrasses me , but to refuse them would be unmannerly.
Varnished, aristocratic and sumptuous colours with more acid and trifle tones.
sentences.cn: 涂漆, 贵族和华丽的色彩带有酸性和戏耍的色调.
我们在富丽堂皇的环境中用餐。

sentences.en: Where, my dear Charles, did you find this sumptuous greenery?
sentences.cn: 亲爱的查尔斯, 你在什么地方发现这片繁盛葱茏的草木的.

words.tran_cn: 限制费用的；禁止奢侈的

trans.tran_cn: 豪华的，奢侈的，腆，美轮美奂
